title: Medical monitoring generic template for visualization
description: This report visualizes input data with a function of the medical monitoring package. The data can be compared to the data of a previous batch, in the table associated to the plot ('comparisonTable' parameters).

templatePackage.doc: package from which the template should be extracted

dataFileName.doc: name of the data file of interest

plotFunction.doc: plotting function of the package to consider

plotParams.doc: parameters for the plotting function. Parameters depending on the dataset of interest can be specified as:\cr\code{[parameterName]: !expr-lazy [dataI]}

comparisonTableType.doc: output type of the comparison table. If specified, an additional column: 'Comparison Type' is included in the table attached to the plot.

comparisonTableParams.doc: parameters for the comparison table, passed to \link[glpgUtilityFct]{compareTables}. If referenceVars is not specified, all variables displayed in the plot are used.

loopingVar.doc: data variable(s) to loop over, for which each output should be created

loopingNMax.doc: maximum number of elements of \code{loopingVar} to include in the report
